channel.title: data-science | JooYoung Seo: RStudio Summer Intern 2020; Learning Scientist for Inclusive Learning Ecologies

item.title: Data Science
item.description: Using R and Python, data crawling, data munging, cleaning, exploratory/confirmatory data analysis, data visualization, and data modelling are conducted.

item.title: ezpickr
item.description: Please consult with package site for more information.

item.title: Quantitative Ethnography
item.description: This project is a methodological journey towards my dissertation that employs a novel mixed-methods called “Quantitative Ethnography” employing data science approach to a large corpus of texts in a rigorous, reliable, and reproducible fashion.
